text: Ezɨ Josua me mɨgɨa ghaze, “Ia zuamɨra kamaghɨn mɨkɨman markɨ, egh suam, kɨ Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn ziam fam. Guizbangɨra, Ikiavɨra Itir God, godɨn igharazitam a ko magh garir puvatɨ. A uabɨra, ia an ziam fasa a ifonge. Ia akɨrim a gasaragh godɨn igharazibar ziaba fɨtɨ, a ian arazir kuraba gɨn amadaghan kogham.
